content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 21: Roads have been blocked due to mudslide triggered by rains in seven different locations across the country today as well, according to the Nepal Police. Central spokesperson of Nepal Police, Deputy Inspector General Binod Ghimire, said the Jajarkot-Dolpa section is completely blocked at present. This road section is completel

title: Roadways obstructed at seven places across country
